dict.acceptation: 驱车旅行；驱动力；车道；驱动器；

sent.orig: Rear-Wheel Drive-Wheel Drive-Wheel Drive, or-Wheel Drive?
sent.trans: 后轮驱动，四轮驱动，四轮驱动，或四轮驱动？

sent.orig: Resizing drive %1 shifts free space between drive %1 and drive %2.
sent.trans: 正在调整驱动器%1及驱动器%2之间的可用空间，重新设置驱动器%1的可用空间。

sent.orig: It'synthesizes the advantages of belt drive, chain drive and gear drive.
sent.trans: 它综合了带转动、链转动和齿轮转动各自的优点。

sent.orig: Comparative Analysis of Electric Drive top drive drilling system and hydraulic driven top drive drilling system.
sent.trans: 对比分析电驱动顶驱和液压驱动顶驱。

sent.orig: The drive is different from electric-magnetic drive for PWR or hydraulic drive for BWR.
sent.trans: 这种传动不同于压水堆上使用的电磁-机械传动，也不同于沸水堆上使用的液压传动。
